mapper.delete: DELETE FROM synthesis_cutting_tool_location_config WHERE 1 = 1 and id = #{id}

mapper.update:
UPDATE synthesis_cutting_tool_location_config SET
location = #{location},
count = #{count},

replace_cutting_tool_code1 = #{replaceCuttingToolCode1},
